languages.text: "Сама не разберу. Мрак меня — раз! — и словно пеленой накрыл. Я не ослепла, наоборот — я вижу его. И только его".

traits.locale_text: "Сама не разберу. Мрак меня — раз! — и словно пеленой накрыл. Я не ослепла, наоборот — я вижу его. И только его".

languages.text: "I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."
languages.original_text: "Сама не разберу. Мрак меня — раз! — и словно пеленой накрыл. Я не ослепла, наоборот — я вижу его. И только его".

traits.locale_text: "No clue. The darkness just wrapped around me — wham! — like some kind of veil. I'm not blind. On the contrary, I see it. And it's the only thing I see."
"No clue. The darkness just wrapped around me — wham! — like some kind of veil. I'm not blind. On the contrary, I see it. And it's the only thing I see."
"I have no idea. Darkness just wrapped around me — wham! — like some kind of veil. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."
"I have no idea. Darkness just wrapped around me — wham! — like some kind of veil. But I have not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."
"I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."
"I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

languages.text: "Ich habe keinen Schimmer. Die Dunkelheit hat sich einfach um mich gelegt — bumm! — wie eine Art Schleier. Doch ich bin nicht blind geworden, nein. Es ist die Dunkelheit, die ich sehe. Sie ist das Einzige, was ich sehe."
languages.original_text: "I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe keinen Schimmer. Die Dunkelheit hat sich einfach um mich gelegt — bumm! — wie eine Art Schleier. Doch ich bin nicht blind geworden, nein. Es ist die Dunkelheit, die ich sehe. Sie ist das Einzige, was ich sehe."

languages.text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée. Les ténèbres m'ont enveloppée d'un coup, comme si un voile était tombé. Mais je ne suis pas devenue aveugle, non. Je vois les ténèbres. Je ne vois plus que ça. »
languages.original_text: "I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'en ai pas la moindre idée. Les ténèbres m'ont enveloppée d'un coup, comme si un voile était tombé. Mais je ne suis pas devenue aveugle, non. Je vois les ténèbres. Je ne vois plus que ça. »

languages.text: “我也不知道，黑暗‘唰’地一下包围了我，就像某种黑纱一样。但我的眼睛没瞎，真的没瞎。我只看到了黑暗，其它什么都看不到。”
languages.original_text: "I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: “我也不知道，黑暗‘唰’地一下包围了我，就像某种黑纱一样。但我的眼睛没瞎，真的没瞎。我只看到了黑暗，其它什么都看不到。”

languages.text: 「何なのかしら。闇が私を包み込んで…バンって！まるでヴェールのようよ。でも、視力を失ったわけじゃない。見えているのは闇。それしか見えないわ」
languages.original_text: "I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: 「何なのかしら。闇が私を包み込んで…バン！まるでヴェールのようよ。でも、視力を失ったわけじゃない。見えているのは闇。それしか見えないわ」

languages.text: «No tengo ni idea. La oscuridad me había engullido. ¡Catapum! Era como un velo. Pero no me he quedado sin visión, no. Es la oscuridad lo que veo. Es lo único que veo».
languages.original_text: "I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: «No tengo ni idea. La oscuridad me envolvió como en una especie de velo. Pero no me he quedado sin visión, no. Es la oscuridad lo que veo. Es lo único que veo».

languages.text: "Hiçbir fikrim yok. Karanlık, bir perde gibi şak diye beni sarmalayıverdi. Kör olmadım gerçi, hayır. Karanlığı görüyorum. Tek gördüğüm bu."
languages.original_text: "I have no idea. Darkness just enveloped me — bam! — like some kind of veil. But I've not gone blind, no. It is the darkness that I see. It is the only thing I see."

traits.locale_text: "Hiçbir fikrim yok. Karanlık, bir perde gibi şak diye beni sarmalayıverdi. Kör olmadım gerçi, hayır. Karanlığı görüyorum. Tek gördüğüm bu."
